SELECT b.boardIdx, c.categoryIdx, c.name, b.title, b.writer, b.content, b.hit, b.regdate, b.moddate, f.fileIdx, f.originalName, f.fileSize FROM tb_board b JOIN tb_category c ON b.categoryIdx = c.categoryIdx LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_file f ON b.boardIdx = f.boardIdx WHERE
b.regDate >= #{startDate} AND
#{endDate} >= b.regDate AND
b.categoryIdx = #{categoryIdx} AND
(b.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR b.writer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR b.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) AND
1=1 GROUP BY b.boardIdx, f.fileidx

SELECT b.boardIdx, c.categoryIdx, c.name AS categoryName, b.title, b.writer, b.content, b.password, b.hit, b.regdate, b.moddate FROM tb_board b JOIN tb_category c ON b.categoryIdx = c.categoryIdx WHERE b.boardIdx = #{boardIdx};
